3. Why Some People Still Run Into Problems

6. Why Adobeâ€™s Paywall Persists Anyway

8. When Paid Tools Might Be Justified

There are narrow cases where a paid PDF editor can make sense:

  • Immigration lawyers handling hundreds of client forms.

  • Agencies that need to merge, redact, or batch-rename PDFs.

  • Teams building automation scripts for internal case management.

If thatâ€™s you, paying for Acrobat Standard or Pro can be cost-effective.

9. The Bigger Picture: Access to Bureaucracy Shouldnâ€™t Be Behind a Paywall

Itâ€™s easy to forget, but access to immigration paperwork is part of access to justice.
